name.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Annuaire inversé :A QUI EST CE NUMÉRO?

short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Pour trouver à qui appartient un numéro, utilisez notre annuaire: aquiestcenumero.org

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
The use of the white pages directory online started out as a fun way of tracing old friends and family members online. Today, it is a different story because it is used for security and business purposes. Sometimes you get baffling intriguing strange calls. You are so curious such that you must find out who the caller was. After all, you cannot afford to let it go just like that, considering that abductors could be just a step away from you. The good news is that online white pages directory will allow you access into the reverse look up services where you can user the phone number to trace the identity of the caller. At the same time, you can also use the identity (name) of a person to trace their phone number. That is the power of the reverse look up services. 
  
White pages directory on the internet is just a listing of people and their names, phone numbers etc. just like in the telephone directories where the white pages are for people and the yellow pages for commercial listings, the white pages online will help you find the identity of the caller, or somebody’s phone number. They will also find a long lost friend, or even a stranger who once did you a favor, which you feel compelled to return now. There are many sites on the internet offering white pages directories. Therefore, it will be a bit daunting to find the right site to get the best service from.

Look for the most recent white pages directories. With such, you will avoid the frustrations of being unable to find the identity of the caller that you are interested in. Normally, the white pages online directories have numerous advantages over the normal telephone white pages. One, they have huge databases that contain virtually the name and number of anyone who has a number. Second, they are updated frequently and therefore, they should contain the most recent information concerning the person you are interested in. And that is just the bottom line. When you are looking for the best directories, you should make sure that you go for the most recently updated. 

However much one might prefer the hard copy telephone directory, the fact is that they are less satisfactory.  At the same time, most people spend some considerable amounts of time online and therefore, they find it easier to go for the white pages directories. This is a good gesture for the environment because by shunning the paper telephone directories, we will be saving a lot of trees. That not withstanding, it is also cheaper to go online. If you want to be removed from or added to the online phone listings, you can contact the webmaster who runs the site to put your request into effect. 

The online white pages directory is not only for personal listings, but it is also used for business listings. Known also as the business white pages, this is a good way for a bank or financier to verify the legitimacy of a business. If the business is not listed, it will raise suspicion. 

Search engines too can be used as white pages directories where you enter the phone number or name of a person in the search box. The limitation is that you will get so many and digging through the maze of listings might be overwhelming.
